categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jule was a Human male who was an ensign in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Ensign Jule appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Alderaan Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock. Jule was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
